message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MA, cs.GT, cs.SY

The paper discusses reinforcement learning in multiagent games, which is a topic that falls under the intersection of several subfields in computer science. The use of policy gradient methods suggests that the paper may belong to the subfield of machine learning (cs.LG) or artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The focus on multiagent games suggests that the paper may also belong to the subfield of multiagent systems (cs.MA) or game theory (cs.GT). Finally, the mention of coordination and convergence suggests that the paper may also belong to the subfield of control systems (cs.SY). Therefore, the most likely subcategories are cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MA, cs.GT, and cs.SY, in that order.
